Fur Pelt.description: Warm fur that could be useful for crafting gear.

Venom Gland.description: A poisonous gland used to craft venomous weapons.

Silk.description: Fine spider silk used in crafting robes or light armor.

Poison Fang.description: A curved fang coated in venom. Could be useful in alchemy.

Slime Core.description: The jiggly center of a defeated slime.

Bat Wing.description: A leathery wing from a bat. Lightweight and magical.

Feather.description: A fluffy feather. Light and fragile, used in scrolls or fletching.

Rat Tail.description: A tail riddled in diseases, used in poisons

Flame Core.description: A smoldering core of raw fire energy. Used in fire-based weapon crafting.

Charred Bone.description: Blackened bone from a lava beast. Still warm to the touch.

Curse Shard.description: A shard pulsing with dark magic. Used to craft cursed equipment.

Frost Crystal.description: A frozen crystal radiating ancient cold. Often used in frost enchantments.

Wraith Essence.description: Distilled from a ghost. A key ingredient in spectral gear.

Storm Fragment.description: Crackling with electricity, itâ€™s part of a broken elemental core.

Charged Core.description: A core pulsing with unstable energy. Handle with caution.

Knight Crest.description: The insignia of a long-dead order. Used in crafting heavy armor.

Cursed Chitin.description: Tough insectoid plating imbued with abyssal energy.

Void Fragment.description: A sliver of the void. Used in the creation of legendary weapons.

Eldritch Eye.description: Still blinks occasionally. Required for eldritch rituals and gear.
